Bolk6nski recognized Prince Repnin whom he had met in Petersburg society. Beside him stood a lad of nineteen, also a wounded officer of the Horse Guards. 
Bonaparte, having come up at a gallop, stopped his horse. 
"Which is the senior?" he asked, on seeing the prisoners.
